name: Ocean Splash Match 3
description:
Various missions deep in the Ocean!

This fun and beautiful match 3 puzzle game is sure to become your favorite!

Have fun with dynamic obstacles and well designed puzzles in hundreds of levels! Immerse yourself in this deceptively simple, stress-free!
Ocean Splash Match 3 is a simple game, meant for players who just want to play and have fun, without being distracted by bells and whistles. Unlike other match 3 games, this game is all about YOU.


What you'll love about Ocean Splash Match 3:

NO Life, Stamina, or Energy!
Play puzzles for however long you want without waiting to recharge!

NO internet connection required!
Play whenever, wherever; even without wifi or data!

NO large storage space needed!
Play without worrying about your games eating up all your space!

NO impossible levels designed to make players fail!
Play for fun, with real, honest challenge puzzles!


Explore the new stage and missions with your fish friends!
